name: Moles Race
description:
A Begginer game, make in 3 days for a task in Malaga University. Have fun, recomended for 2 players.

A and D for move left or right player 1.

Numpad 4 and Numpad 6 for move left or right player 2.

Be the first in reach the Exit, and get the high score, breaking and hitting the blocks.

Have Fun!
